snippet: Getting a car’s air-conditioning fixed can be expensive. That’s why we have guys like this YouTube whiz, who teach you how to keep cool on $15 or less.
abstract: Getting a car’s air-conditioning fixed can be expensive. That’s why we have guys like this YouTube whiz, who teach you how to keep cool on $15 or less.

headline.main: An Amazingly Simple Way to Add Air-Conditioning to Your Car
